column4: hey guys. I installed ubuntu on a friend's computer, and he liked it, but wants me to set it up for dual-boot. Is there a way for me to install windows XP on his computer, without getting rid of GRUB?
or at least, if i can't do that, then is there a way to reinstall GRUB after Windows XP manhandles it?
have to reinstlal grub after installing windows
I wouldn't but that's just me
